title: Bug 110566: Wrong data set result returned when setting an invalid filter expression [row[0]]
description: When setting a filter using an invalid expression [row[0] equals to 0], the data set returns the wrong result or a null result set.
OB: When setting a filter in the data set with the expression [row[0] equals to 0] and clicking on the Preview tab, the first result record is returned.
EB: The data set should return an error message indicating that the filter expression [row[0] equals to 0] is invalid.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Set a filter in the data set using the expression [row[0] equals to 0].
2. Click on the Preview tab.
